2: (\forall int i; 1 <= i && i <= size / 2; elements[2 * i].compareTo(elements[i]) >= 0 && (2 * i + 1 <= size ? elements[2 * i + 1].compareTo(elements[i]) >= 0 : true))
3-1: (\forall int i;1 <= i && i <= \old(size);(\old(elements[i].isReferenced())) ==> (\exists int j ; 1 <= j <= size;elements[j].equals(\old(elements[i]))))
3-2: (\forall int i;1 <= i && i <= \old(size);(\old(!elements[i].isReferenced())) ==> (\forall int j ; 1 <= j <= size;!elements[j].equals(\old(elements[i]))))
